thread.title: Ground News - UN seeks greater role for women in conflict resolution.
thread.title_full: Ground News - UN seeks greater role for women in conflict resolution.

author: Noticias Ao Minuto
title: Ground News - UN seeks greater role for women in conflict resolution.
text:
Summary by Noticias Ao Minuto In a statement to the Human Rights Council on International Women's Day, marked today, Turk said that in a world currently marked by conflicts, women "hold together families and entire communities". Women demonstrate "incredible resilience and strength". The United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights said, cited by the Spanish agency EFE. Turk said that many women have demonstrated courage as defenders of human rights and peace, either in… Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
